name: MSCRMToolInstaller
description: Configures the tools/dependencies required by all of the tasks
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: This task must be added at least once before other tasks in each agent phase for all other tasks to work.

groups.name: tools
groups.displayName: Tool Versions (Use to override versions of specific tools)

inputs.name: nugetUseProxy
inputs.label: Use Agent Proxy for Nuget Feed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to use agent proxy (if configured) to connect to the nuget feed

inputs.name: psUseProxy
inputs.label: Use Agent Proxy for PowerShell Gallery Feed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to use agent proxy (if configured) to connect to the PowerShell Gallery feed

inputs.name: coreToolsVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.CrmSdk.CoreTools - Version (Nuget)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [9.1.0.92](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.CrmSdk.CoreTools/9.1.0.92) Type latest to use the latest version available
